casebody.data:
First Cornerstone Bank
v.
Michael Portnoy, d/b/a Mid Atlantic Judgment Enforcement, Daniel DeStefano; Petition of Michael Portnoy d/b/a Mid Atlantic Judgment Enforcement35 NO. 898 MAL 2015 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania May 03, 2016 Appeal from the Superior Court.

Justice WECHT did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.

Disposition: Denied.
